item.description:
Sorry for the short notice, but on Saturday there is a 2 mile and a 1 mile swim in Historic Salem, MA. I will be doing the 2 mile myself, and I have swim at this event for the past two years and it is great. If the set up is the same as last year, for the 2 mi it is just a two loop course, and I think there might even be a refreshment boat mid course. It is a great way to get over the fear of an open water swim start, and then you can relax instead of sprinting to T1!

Find the registration info here
http://www.bnsfitness...

Happy Swimming!

Jen
item.how_to_find_us: I will be there, wearing a red/black swimsuit, probably with a couple people
item.name: Wild Fish 1 mile and Purely Mad 2 mile swims
